LanguageData.DR_FakeTail.label: Dragonian fake tail
LanguageData.DR_FakeTail.description: It is a fake Dragonian tail made of leather.
LanguageData.DR_BionicTail.label: bionic tail
LanguageData.DR_BionicTail.description: An advanced artificial Dragonian tail. It also has a small AI that automatically balances the user's missing.
